alert.note: Alert for Central Interior (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 11:54AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow with a chance of mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Central Interior. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall north of the Tanana River. Near blizzard conditions on summits along the Elliott Highway. Freezing rain and ice accumulation mainly from the Nenana Hills and Parks Highway southwest.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
